grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 詐欺【サギ】fraud, swindle, graft, cheating, trick, scam
詐欺師【サギシ】swindler, imposter, crook, cheater
欺詐【ギサ】fraud, fraudulence, dupery, hoax
kun reading compounds: 偽る【いつわる】to lie, to cheat, to pretend, to feign, to falsify, to trick, to deceive
